name: Tonko - The Tiny Sushi Chef
description:
TONKO

Tonko is a student project inspired by the Sokoban style games.

You play as Tonko a very tiny sushi chef, the goal is to stack ingredients in the correct way to deliver sushis.

Beware of the rat who'll try to steal your ingredients!

Creators:

  • Ismail LAHLOU - Isma LHL https://itch.io/profile/isma-lhl
  • Enzo LEBLANC-GALBERT - SAGII https://itch.io/profile/sagiii
  • Alexandre DEFLANDRE - ShauKaula https://itch.io/profile/shaukaula
  • Maxime PINARD

Credits:

  • Tonko 3D Model: Samir Kazah - https://sketchfab.com/samir.kaza
  • Rat 3D Model: ArtesDigitales UCJC - https://sketchfab.com/ArtesDigitalesUCJC
  • Sounds: https://www.zapsplat.com/
